article_text:
Head of New York archdiocese says Pope Francis wants to meet with undocumented immigrants

Dolan attributes pontiff’s popularity to his authenticity

Calls big turnout at Charlotte Catholic event Christian faith ‘on steroids’

article_metadata.title: Cardinal Dolan talks up pope visit, salutes devotion of Southern Catholics | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: He’s one of the highest-profile Catholic leaders in the world – and one of the most quotable.
